A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Cinematic if nothing else. Sometimes tedious and it felt its length. Like they smooshed the original trilogy into one movie. Too much fan service\, again. It was exciting and boring\, good and bad\, emotional and depth of cardboard\, campy serious and funny. Meh it was fine. Star Wars is a hamster wheel; someone please kill that hamster once and for all.
